ygData.subject: H3 and Robots.txt hosted via redirects.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Do any of you know whether H3 will cope when a robots.txt file is hosted as a redirect? The URL http://www.swims.nhs.uk/robots.txt is actually a 302

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="us-ascii"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hi,

 

Do any of you know whether H3 will cope when a robots.txt file is h=
osted
as a redirect? The URL http://www.swims.nhs.uk/robots.txt is actually=
 a
302 re-direct to  http://www.swims.nhs.uk/webview/robots.txt (the
redire=
ct also reports a Content-Type: text/html; charset=3Diso-8859-1, in
case th=
at matters).

 

Would this cause H3 to ignore robots.txt?

 

Thanks,

And=
y

 

--

Dr Andrew N Jackson

Web Archiving Technical Lead

The British Li=
brary

 

Tel: 01937 546602

Mobile: 07765 897948

Web: www.webarchive.org.=
uk <http://www.webarchive.org.uk/> 

Twitter: @UKWebArchive
